baby dressed and covered and have the mother/relative accompany you.
/circle6  In hot weather, ensure that the baby does not become overheated.
/circle6  Ensure that the baby receives breastfeeds. If the baby cannot be breastfed, give 
expressed breast milk with a clean spoon or from a cup.
/circle6  Maintain and clear the airway, if required. 
/circle6  If the baby is receiving oxygen, check the oxygen fl  ow and tubing every 15 mi
